# Application Support

Thank you for your interest in my portfolio project!  
This document outlines where (and how) to find support for the app
if it doesn't work as intended on your machine.

## Table of Contents

- [Application Support](#application-support)
  - [Table of Contents](#table-of-contents)
  - [Encountered a Bug?](#encountered-a-bug)
  - [Encountered a Security Issue?](#encountered-a-security-issue)

## Encountered a Bug?

If you find a bug, please report it as soon as possible, so I can investigate
and fix it.

To report a bug, open a GitHub Issue in this repository, or
<a href="mailto:ethankletschke@outlook.com">email me</a>.

As specified in [the contribution document](./CONTRIBUTING.md), pull requests
are disabled, so please contact me instead.

## Encountered a Security Issue?

Security issues are taken seriously.  
Please _**do NOT **_ make a security issue public with a GitHub Issue under ANY
circumstance. <a href="mailto:ethankletschke@outlook.com">Email me</a> and set it
as high priority. I'll respond as soon as possible.
